about_the_game:
"The Coldest Winter" is a mature psychological horror story that promises a haunting adventure, icy landscapes, and difficult decisions. Throughout the journey, you will play as Jovanna Peña, a hardened New Yorker who is dealing with the coldest winter she has ever experienced. You will encounter an unhinged group of characters, and together you will try to survive the unrelenting cold and unravel the chilling truth behind this unnatural weather.

Narrative Kaleidoscope

Immerse yourself in a mature, adaptive narrative that challenges your emotions, fears, and morals to uncover a terrifying secret. Featuring multiple thematic branches that alter the themes, tone, pacing, and narrative structure to reflect the parts you resonate most with.

Survival Kit

Gather the necessary tools, equipment, and gear to prepare yourself for harsh weather and dangerous encounters.

Feel the Struggle

Experience an innovative choice-based gameplay mechanic that simulates the weight of real-world decision-making.

A Nueva York

The Coldest Winter explores a different side of New York, featuring a captivating blend of bold original artwork and Latin-inspired music from cultures all over the city.
